welcome_message_body: Welcome to Las Condes, Chile! Known for its beautiful parks, vibrant culture, and stunning views of the Andes, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that this charming city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Wenger Haus
restaurants.description: Wenger Haus is a bakery located in Santiago de Chile.
restaurants.address: Toma Moro 1749 (Latadia), Santiago de Chile, Metropolitana de Santiago de Chile

restaurants.name: Soler
restaurants.description: Soler is a sandwich spot located in Las Condes.
restaurants.address: Los Militares 5934 (Manquehue), Las Condes, Metropolitana de Santiago de Chile

restaurants.name: Barra Chalaca
restaurants.description: Barra Chalaca is a peruvian restaurant located in Las Condes.
restaurants.address: Las Condes, Metropolitana de Santiago de Chile

restaurants.name: La Chocolatine
restaurants.description: La Chocolatine is a bakery located in Vitacura.
restaurants.address: Av. Vitacura 7269, Vitacura, Metropolitana de Santiago de Chile

restaurants.name: Rishtedar
restaurants.description: Rishtedar is a indian restaurant located in Santiago de Chile.
restaurants.address: Vitacura 5461, Vitacura, Santiago de Chile, Metropolitana de Santiago de Chile

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Arturo Merino Benitez Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal used for international flights, with modern facilities and amenities.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights, with a more relaxed atmosphere.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.
